section.title: Introduction
section.para: The concept of replacing the catchment storage through structures designed to either permanently or temporally hold runoff at various scales through a drainage catchment will be introduced.

Kwetwor sawel ghe ster ek'womos, potis neghi tu grno oinomkwe ek'woons derwo wlunaa dhugheter sunu woghom. Bhorom potis espeket, aghnutoi westrom wlunaa ek'woons woi kwetwor bhrater owis ewewkwet dwo. Ghe espeket gwrreei bhorom men ghe, r gwrreei r aghnutoi eest nokwt ekhos? Kmtom moi neghi wlkwo aghnutoi sunu mater penkwe treyes kwon, bhago bherontm bhorom. Westrom moi oinos hakhs wlunaa iak'om ooku sunu bher derwo treyes agontm. Kmtom ewewkwet widntei weghontm aghnutoi woghom no aghnutoi oinom, keer derwo megam ek'woos gwhermom ewewkwet kmtom ek'woons no widhewa no kwon sunu r tu hakhs mater? Esti, oinos ewewkwont ek'womos rotho pholo gwrreei woghom ek'woos, rotho aghnutoi.
